edu.cmu.sv.sdsp.util

Class APIHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.sv.sdsp.util.APIHelper

  • public class APIHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class which has utility methods to perform GET and POST operations on all operations supported by the Sensor Data Platform Service API.
    Author:
    Surya Kiran, Gonghan Wang

                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#1 Helper method to invoke get_devices depending on the result type.
        Parameters:
        resultType - - JSON or CSV
        Returns:
        - Value returned by API
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processGetSensorTypes

        public static final java.lang.String processGetSensorTypes(java.lang.String deviceType,
                                     APIHelper.ResultType resultType)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#2 Query all sensor types contained in a specific device model (type).
        Parameters:
        deviceType - -Model of the device
        resultType -
        • type of a contained sensor, e.g., temperature, co2 level etc. a device type could correspond to multiple sensor types if the device has multiple sensors.
        Returns:
        The request string which invokes the HTTP GET operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processPublishSensorReadings

        public static final java.lang.String processPublishSensorReadings(JsonObject param)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#3 Publish sensor readings to sensor data service platform.
        Parameters:
        param -
        • The json object contains the query contents. The jsonobject contains device_id, timestamp, sensor_type, sensor_value
        Returns:
        The request string which invokes the HTTP POST operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processQuerySensorReadings

        public static final java.lang.String processQuerySensorReadings(java.lang.String query)
                                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#4 Query sensor readings for a specific type of sensor, in a particular device, at a specific time point.
        Parameters:
        query -
        • device_id: Unique uri/identifier of a device.
        • -timestamp: Time of the readings to query.
        • -sensor_type: Type of the sensor (e.g., temperature, CO2, etc.) to query.
        • -result_format: Either json or csv.
        Returns:
        The request string which invokes the HTTP GET operation.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • processGetSensorReadingBYTimeDevice

        public static java.lang.String processGetSensorReadingBYTimeDevice(java.lang.String query)
                                                            throws java.io.IOException
        Query sensor readings for a specific type of sensor, in a particular device, for a specific time range. Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#5
        Parameters:
        query -
        • -device_id: Unique uri/identifier of a device.
        • start_time: Start time to retrieve the sensor readings.
        • end_time: End time to retreive the sensor readings.
        • sensor_type: Type of the sensor (e.g., temperature, CO2, etc.) to retrieve its readings.
        • result_format: Either json or csv.
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP GET operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • processGetSensorReadingsAllDevices

          public static java.lang.String processGetSensorReadingsAllDevices(java.lang.String query)
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
          Query all sensor readings at a time point (within 60 seconds), of a specific sensor type contained in all registered devices. Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#6
          Parameters:
          query -
            -timestamp: Time to query the last readings of all sensors for all devices registered at the sensor data service platform. sensor_type: Type of the sensor (e.g., temperature, CO2, etc.). result_format: Either json or csv.
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP GET operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • processGetLastestSensorReadings

          public static java.lang.String processGetLastestSensorReadings(java.lang.String query)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
          Query all latest sensor readings, of a specific sensor type contained in all devices. If no reading for a sensor in the last 60 seconds, the latest stored reading of the corresponding sensor will be returned. Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#7
          Parameters:
          query -
          • sensor_type: Type of the sensor (e.g., temperature, CO2, etc.).
          • result_format: Either json or csv.
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP GET operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

          Parameters:
          param -

          • user_defined_fields (string): User defined fields
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP POST operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • addSensor

          public static final java.lang.String addSensor(JsonObject param)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
          Add a new sensor to sensor data service platform. Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#9
          Parameters:
          param -
          • print_name (string): Name of the sensor.
          • sensor_type (string): Its sensor type.
          • device_id (string): The device ID it belongs to.
          • user_defined_fields (string): User defined fields.
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP POST operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • addDeviceType

          public static final java.lang.String addDeviceType(JsonObject param)
                                            throws java.io.IOException
          Add a new device type to sensor data service platform. Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#10
          Parameters:
          param - -json object contains
          • device_type_name (string): Name of the device type.
          • manufacturer (string): Name of the manufacturer.
          • version (string): Version of the device type.
          • user_defined_fields (string): User defined fields.
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP POST operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • addDevice

          public static final java.lang.String addDevice(JsonObject param)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
          Add a new device to sensor data service platform. Linked: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#11
          Parameters:
          param - -json object contains
          • device_type (string): Name of the device type.
          • device_agent (string): Name of the device agent.
          • device_id (string): The device id (i.e., network address, uri, macaddress to date). This device_id will be needed as a reference in all consequent senarios.
          • location_description (string): Location.
          • latitude (string): Latitude.
          • longitude (string): Longitude.
          • altitude (string): Altitude.
          • position_format_system (string): Format of the position.
          • user_defined_fields (string): User defined fields.
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP POST operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • processGetSpecificSensorReadings

          public static final java.lang.String processGetSpecificSensorReadings(java.lang.String query)
                                                               throws java.io.IOException
          Query sensor readings for a specific type of sensor, in a particular device, at a specific time point. Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#12
          Parameters:
          query - -A string like <"device_id">/<"time">/<"sensor_type">/<"result_format" >?dateformat=ISO8601
          • device_id: Unique uri/identifier of a device.
          • time: Time of the readings to query.
          • sensor_type: Type of the sensor (e.g., temperature, CO2, etc.) to query.
          • result_format: Either json or csv.
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP GET operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException

        • processGetSensorReadingsTimeRange

          public static final java.lang.String processGetSensorReadingsTimeRange(java.lang.String query)
                                                                throws java.io.IOException
          Query sensor readings for a specific type of sensor, in a particular device, for a specific readable time range. Link: https://github.com/SensorServicePlatform/APIs#13
          Parameters:
          query - - format: <"device_id">/<"start_time">/<"end_time">/<"sensor_type" >/<"result_format">?dateformat=ISO8601
          Returns:
          The request string which invokes the HTTP GET operation.
          Throws:
          java.io.IOException
